author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

Title says it all. Useful when debugging conditions and or local reconstruction issues.
Supports two modes:
   * `printPixelTrackerMap detid1 detid2 detid3 ...`
   * `printPixelTrackerMap --input-file input.txt`


#### PR validation:

Run the script with a [user generated list](https://github.com/user-attachments/files/16740445/output3.txt) and obtained the following map:

![Phase1PixelSummaryMap](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/273961d8-5e72-4c52-983b-ce82a2f13a6b)

Or:

```console
 cut -d' ' -f1 $CMSSW_RELEASE_BASE/src/CalibTracker/SiStripCommon/data/SiStripDetInfo.dat | shuf -n 5000 | paste -sd ' ' - | xargs printStripTrackerMap
 ```

generates:

![SiStripsTkMaps](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/014b0978-b8d8-45ca-9e80-617a8fc94e06)
